Sencast Documentation

Sencast uses Sphinx to auto generate its documentation.

Updating Documentation

  1. Make changes to the .rst files

  2. Install the sphinx conda environment

conda env create -f ~/sencast/docs/environment.yml

  1. Rebuild the html docs

conda activate sphinx
cd sencast/docs
make html

  1. Push the changes to the GitHub remote repository

Built with Sphinx using a theme provided by Read the Docs.
